entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
